{/* Hero Text */}

Book Your Train Tickets Effortlessly

Welcome to TrainReservation – your one-stop solution for booking, tracking, and managing train journeys with ease.

🎫 Create Reservation 📋 View All Reservations
{/* Why Choose Us */}

Why Choose Us

🚆

Easy Booking

Reserve your train seats in just a few clicks with our user-friendly interface.

⏱️

Real-Time Updates

Stay updated with train schedules and journey details anytime.

🔒

Secure Management

View and manage all your reservations securely in one place.

{/* Stats Section */}

+250

Trains Daily

10K+

Bookings Processed

98%

Customer Satisfaction

{/* How It Works */}

How It Works

1. Search & Select

Choose your source, destination, and date to view available trains.

2. Reserve Seat

Fill passenger details and select your preferred seat.

3. Get Confirmation

Instant confirmation with ticket details via email/SMS.

{/* Testimonials */}

What Our Users Say

"Booking my train tickets has never been easier. The interface is clean and very intuitive!"

– Priya S., Student

"I love how fast the platform is. Also, the real-time updates saved me from missing my train!"

– Ankit R., Engineer
{/* Call-to-Action */}

Ready to Book Your Journey?

Start reserving your seat today with just a few clicks.

Book Now
